arts.ttl: Milan Defender Praises High-Flying Midfielder After Hellas Verona Win
arts.sum: Milan defender Matteo Gabbia hailed the atmosphere in the Rossoneri dressing room following a gutsy 1-0 win at Hellas Verona. Tijjani Reijnders' second-half winner inspired Paulo Fonseca's injury-hit side to an all-important triumph at Stadio Marc'Antonio Bentegodi. The post Milan Defender Praises High-Flying Midfielder After Hellas Verona Win appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Verona 0-1 Milan: Match Report
arts.sum: AC Milan secured a vital victory against Hellas Verona, thanks to an impressive assist from Youssouf Fofana that set up Tijjani Reijnders for the opening goal. This win was crucial for the Rossoneri, who had struggled recently with only one victory in their last five Serie A matches. The post Serie A | Verona 0-1 Milan: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Christian Pulisic named among the 100 best footballers of 2024
arts.sum: David’s 17 goals and four assists in the current season, combined with 26 goals and nine assists from the previous campaign, have earned him the 77th spot on the list, making him the highest-ranked CONCACAF player. In 2024, counting both the conclusion of the 2023–24 Serie A season and the start of the 2024–25 campaign, Pulisic has made 48 appearances, scoring 16 goals and providing 13 assists at the club level.
